i1.blurb: Upon dying, Kog'Maw starts a chain reaction in his body which causes him to move faster and detonate after 4 seconds; dealing 100 + (25 x lvl) true damage to surrounding enemies.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Upon taking [[death|fatal damage]], '''Kog'Maw''' remains active for 4 seconds, becoming {{tip|pacify|pacified}}, {{tip|invulnerability|invulnerable}}, {{tip|untargetable}} and gaining up to {{sti|ms|{{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} over the duration. He then explodes, dealing {{as|{{pp|125 to 550}} {{sti|true damage|link=yes}}}} to all nearby enemies.
i1.name: Icathian Surprise
notes: * '''Kog'Maw''' is cleansed of all debuffs upon triggering ''Icathian Surprise''.
* {{ii|Guardian Angel}} and {{ai|Chronoshift|Zilean}} will take precedence over ''Icathian Surprise''.
** {{sbc|Possible Bug:}} Dying while affected by {{ai|Chronoshift|Zilean}} allows '''Kog'Maw''' to trigger ''Icathian Surprise'' immediately and then a second time right after he revives.
* After ''Icathian Surprise'' ends, the corpse of '''Kog'Maw''' will retain body block for the duration of his death animation.

* If '''Kog'Maw''' has an auto attack in the air at the same time that he's moving while he dies, as long as the auto hits the target after ''Icathian Surprise'' has started '''Kog'Maw''' will be able to auto once during ''Icathian Surprise''.

q1.blurb: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kog'Maw''' launches a corrosive projectile in a target direction, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to the first enemy it hits and reducing their {{sti|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|{{as|magic resistance}}}} for 4 seconds.
q1.name: Caustic Spittle

w1.blurb: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} For the next 8 seconds, '''Kog'Maw's''' basic attacks gain {{sti|range|'''bonus''' range}} and deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} [[On-hit effect|on-hit]], capped at 100 against minions and monsters.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Range|{{ap|130 to 210}}}}
{{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|3 to 6}}% {{as|(+ 1% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}
w1.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
notes: * The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal but does not affect structures.
* ''Bio-Arcane Barrage's'' bonus damage will not interact with {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} but will do so with {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} {{nie|Wind's Fury}}.

e1.blurb: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kog'Maw''' spews a ball of ooze in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies for 1 second.
The ooze lingers for 4 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies within the area for an additional {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
e1.name: Void Ooze
